biography: Tomas, a familiar face from Espoo Ringside Golf, has graced the fairways of the Hector Trophée on three occasions. Though he has yet to capture the coveted Hector Trophée or the individual Victor Trophy, his presence has always been noted.

Known for his contemplative demeanor and meticulous approach to the game, Tomas brings a certain gravitas to the competition. While his trophy cabinet may not yet reflect his dedication, those who have witnessed his play know that he possesses a deep understanding of the game.

Currently considered retired from Hector Trophée events, the possibility of a return remains a topic of speculation among golf enthusiasts. Whether he chooses to compete again or not, Tomas's contributions to the tournament will not soon be forgotten.
